Fun.repeat: Have the bot repeat a message

Info.roles: View the roles of the server

Admin (Requires Perms).purge: Purge a specified number of lines
Admin (Requires Perms).kick: Kick a member from the server
Admin (Requires Perms).ban: Ban a member from the server
Admin (Requires Perms).mute: Mute a member of the server
Admin (Requires Perms).softban: Softban a member of the server
Admin (Requires Perms).unban: Unban a member from the server
Admin (Requires Perms).unmute: Unmute a member of the server
